overview: Business builder that develops and provides new perspectives to drive business goals. Expertise in helping companies expand their revenues through new markets & international expansion. Expertise in business model development and reinvention strategies with an emphasis in developing new markets and implementing product strategies. Specialization in helping companies understand the feasibility, development and marketing of current or future product/service concepts. Expertise in product development projects that need strategy development from “idea” stage, including design/engineering, prototyping, and manufacturing. Expertise in developing integrated multichannel Go-to-Market strategies that engage consumers, increase customer retention, drive market visibility, and increase revenue streams.
